trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Asheville
There was one other sighting in Asheville on or around July 21st 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was travelling down AMBOY rd, on my way to see THE DARK KNIGHT RISES when I saw a very strange grouping of bright orange lights in the sky, maybe 12-14 of them. Grouped together, but still moving around independent of each other. By the time I found a place to pull over, all but 3 of the lights had disappeared someplace, and my cam sucks, and it was 10:30 at night, so this video is pretty sh*tty, but right around 2:50ish, I zoom out and you can see a couple of the lights together. It was eerie as shit to see in person. Caught some on video.
Summary: Bright orange lights in the sky-12 or more. Eventually all but 3 disappeared
